SELECT * FROM ( SELECT count(1) countYesterday FROM tbl_user_normal n, tbl_purchasehistory p WHERE n.user_id = p.puHi_UserId AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(p.puHi_Createdate) <= 1 AND p.puHi_Type = 4 AND p.puHi_ChargeType in (1,2) )aa, ( SELECT count(1) countTotal FROM tbl_user_normal n, tbl_purchasehistory p WHERE n.user_id = p.puHi_UserId
AND p.puHi_Createdate > #{beginTime}
AND p.puHi_Createdate < DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND p.puHi_Type = 4 AND p.puHi_ChargeType in (1,2) )bb, ( SELECT FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(p.puHi_Monetary), 0),2) countTotalMoney FROM tbl_user_normal n, tbl_purchasehistory p WHERE n.user_id = p.puHi_UserId
AND p.puHi_Createdate > #{beginTime}
AND p.puHi_Createdate < DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND p.puHi_Type = 4 AND p.puHi_ChargeType in (1,2) )cc, ( SELECT FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(p.puHi_Monetary), 0),2) countYesterdayMoney FROM tbl_user_normal n, tbl_purchasehistory p WHERE n.user_id = p.puHi_UserId AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(p.puHi_Createdate) <= 1 AND p.puHi_Type = 4 AND p.puHi_ChargeType in (1,2) )dd

SELECT SUM(p.puHi_Monetary) countTotalMoney, DATE_FORMAT(p.puHi_Createdate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS time FROM tbl_user_normal n, tbl_purchasehistory p WHERE n.user_id = p.puHi_UserId
AND p.puHi_Createdate > #{beginTime}
AND p.puHi_Createdate < DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND p.puHi_Type = 4 AND p.puHi_ChargeType in (1,2) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(p.puHi_Createdate, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT count(1) from ( SELECT SUM(IF(p.puHi_ChargeType = 1,p.puHi_Monetary,0)) as AliPay, SUM(IF(p.puHi_ChargeType = 1,1,0)) as AliPayNum, SUM(IF(p.puHi_ChargeType = 2,p.puHi_Monetary,0)) as WxPay, SUM(IF(p.puHi_ChargeType = 2,1,0)) as WxPayNum, DATE_FORMAT( p.puHi_Createdate, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS time FROM tbl_user_normal n, tbl_purchasehistory p WHERE n.user_id = p.puHi_UserId
AND p.puHi_Createdate > #{beginTime}
AND p.puHi_Createdate < DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND p.puHi_Type = 4 AND p.puHi_ChargeType in (1,2) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( p.puHi_Createdate, '%Y-%m-%d' ) order by p.puHi_Createdate DESC )aa
